doc.title: WebExtensions

value.content: WebExtensions is a cross-browser system for developing browser extensions in Firefox. This system provides APIs, which to a large extent are supported across different browsers like Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, Opera Browser, Microsoft Edge, or Apple Safari.
